Name: 학생들의 공포괴담 終 (Students' horrible stories FIN)
About the game: Five Independent incidents. One shadow that penetrates everything. Students' horrible stories FIN is a horror game created with RPG Maker XP. Experience the charm of various characters as you progress through a organized story. Follow the directions of 'The Presenter' and move toward a 'True End' where 'Everyone' becomes 'HAPPY'. As the title suggests, it's a game that confronts an unknown horror, centered on students, not adults. Find out what threatens the innocent students and how to resist them. Depending on the Guest's choice, it may be closer or farther away from the 'True End'. But don't worry. If you don't give up, you can surely achieve your goal. Now, why don't you head for the 'True End', which is a common goal with me? - Iseru, The Presenter There is no coincidence in all incidents. - ??? I recommend it to these people People who like 'horror' but hate 'jump scare' A person who has no objection to reading long stories and pioneering A person who considers cost-effectiveness like 'The Creator' People who like 'Higurashi no Naku Koro ni' I do not recommend for these people Those who want short and thick horror I'm the one who can't read long texts. A person who does not view games as games but only as a implement Creator comment English - Translated up to Chapter 1. Chapter 2 Translation in progress I am not a translation expert, there may be some awkward sentences. If you report this, it will be very helpful to improve the quality of the translation.
